item.title: CVE-2024-25916|2024-06-04T17:35:13.913Z -- joseph%20c%20dolson -- my%20calendar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Joseph C Dolson My Calendar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects My Calendar: from n/a through 3.4.23.
